mapper.select: SELECT LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, LOCATION_PHONE, CATEGORY_NAME, LOCATION_STAR, RESERVATION_LINK, BUSINESS_NO, ADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE, EXPLANATION, MODIFY_DATE FROM LOCATION L JOIN LOCATION_CATEGORY C ON (L.LOCATION_CATEGORY_NO = C.LOCATION_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE L.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT LOCATION_OPTION_NO, LOCATION_NO, GOODS, GOODS_PRICE, ROOM_INFO, ROOM_STATUS, CAPACITY FROM LOCATION_OPTION O JOIN LOCATION L ON (O.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) WHERE L.USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOCATION (LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, LOCATION_PHONE, EXPLANATION, BUSINESS_NO, ADDRESS, USER_NO, LOCATION_CATEGORY_NO) VALUES (NEXTVAL('SEQ_LOC'), #{locationName}, #{locationPhone}, #{explanation}, #{businessNo}, #{address}, #{userNo}, CAST(#{locationCategoryNo} AS INTEGER))
mapper.select: SELECT OPERATION_NO, START_TIME, END_TIME, DAYS, REST_STATUS, LOCATION_NO FROM OPERATION_TIME WHERE LOCATION_NO = #{locationNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPERATION_TIME (OPERATION_NO, LOCATION_NO, DAYS, START_TIME, END_TIME, REST_STATUS) VALUES (NEXTVAL('seq_oper'), #{locationNo}, #{day}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{restStatus})
INSERT INTO PET_SIZE (PET_SIZE_NO, PET_SIZE_NAME, PET_KIND_NO) VALUES (NEXTVAL('seq_ps'), #{petSize}, #{petKindNo})
INSERT INTO ENTER_GRADE (ENTER_NO, LOCATION_NO, PET_SIZE_NO) VALUES (NEXTVAL('seq_ent'), #{locationNo}, #{petSizeNo})
mapper.select: SELECT pk.PET_KIND_NAME, ps.PET_SIZE_NAME, leg.PET_SIZE_NO FROM LOCATION_ENTER_GRADE leg JOIN PET_SIZE ps ON leg.PET_SIZE_NO = ps.PET_SIZE_NO JOIN PET_KIND pk ON ps.PET_KIND_NO = pk.PET_KIND_NO WHERE leg.LOCATION_NO = #{locationNo}

SELECT LOCATION_NO, LOCATION_NAME, LOCATION_PHONE, CATEGORY_NAME, LOCATION_STAR, RESERVATION_LINK, BUSINESS_NO, ADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE, EXPLANATION, MODIFY_DATE FROM LOCATION L JOIN LOCATION_CATEGORY C ON (L.LOCATION_CATEGORY_NO = C.LOCATION_CATEGORY_NO)
